column1: Global Supply Chain and Logistics Management - MSc
column5: As a manager today, you need the the skills to react to our changing world, and the vision to interpret changes for your organisation.On this MSc, you’ll learn to innovate and succeed in global supply chain and logistics. You’ll:gain a forward-looking perspective on the world of supply chain and logistics managementdevelop a high level of strategic awareness of the whole supply chainexplore supply chain management strategy.You’ll learn to apply systems modelling techniques to real supply chain operations, and understand how to develop significant systems and process improvements. Our innovative teaching methods include:
